title: Ola The Comedian - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #8
itunes:title: Ola The Comedian - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #8
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he runs through a selection of cinematic treats with the one OLA THE COMEDIAN!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he runs through a selection of cinematic treats and experiences with the one OLA THE COMEDIAN!


As well as the usual fun and good time chat you have come to expect and deserve, Brett goes in nice and detailed with Ola as they go in on EVERYTHING… So much to unpack… So sit back and enjoy this one as they tear apart all manner of subjects including - from the very start - reading one’s accolades out loud and the difference of US and UK hosts in that regard, how film watching is a difficult task being a new dad (a tale as old as time), blagging his way through mafia film synopses, his preparation for adulthood by his mum showing him some heavy going film selections, enjoying the idea of people hanging out in sitcoms and not wanting real-life hangouts to end (think Kramer in Seinfeld), watching films in the US and romanticising the experience, keeping in touch with his Nigerian heritage again via his mum, and Nollywood! Told you it was a rammed one… Satisfying and nourishing - please enjoy!


––––– ––––– –––––


THIS WEEK'S LINKS:


• OLA THE COMEDIAN on TWITTER!

• OLA on THE INTERNET!

• OLA on FACEBOOK!

• SUNDAY SERVICE!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

• TICKETS TO SEE BRETT @ THE EDINBURGH FRINGE!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!
